reference.title: Recommended inks
reference.shortdesc: For a list of inks recommended by pen manufacturers and printer manufacturers, read this topic.

section.title: Fountain pens
section.p: All brands of fountain pens can use Chelpark inks that are widely available at stationery shops across the country. Additionally, the following ink brands are recommended by the pen manufacturers:

section.title: HP printer
section.p: The cartridge to be used in an HP printer depends upon the model number of the printer, engraved next to the Start button of the printer. Model R2D2 uses the Prefect series of print cartridges while model Zaphod uses the Trillian series.

section.title: Epson printer
section.p: The following detachable pin-up card contains an ink-printer matrix.
